title: Woman Running

adjectives: Of advancing the ball by running
verbs: Move fast by using one's feet, with one foot off the ground at any given time
To move quickly by alternately making a short jump off of either foot.
To move forward quickly upon two feet by alternately making a short jump off either foot.
To drive fast; to step on the accelerator.
nouns: A woman is a female human.
An animal of the sex that produces eggs.
An adult human member of the sex that produces ova and bears young.
An adult female person (as opposed to a man)
Competition where the goal is to complete the course as fast as possible
The sport of competing in races.
The sport of engaging in contests of speed
In sport, racing is a competition of speed, against an objective criterion, usually a clock or to a specific point.

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the woman running emoji captures dynamic motion with graceful form and energetic stride. Her athletic physique and determined expression are brought to life by Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and smooth gradients, suggesting speed and vitality. This emoji is ideal for conveying fitness, achievement, a sense of urgency, or the pursuit of goals with Apple‚Äôs characteristic elegant and empowering visual style.
